item.title: Jerry Adler, Hesh Rabkin on ‘The Sopranos,’ Dies at 96
item.description: Jerry Adler, a former Broadway producer and manager who turned to acting in his sixties and became known to audiences as Hesh Rabkin on “The Sopranos,” died Saturday. He was 96. Adler&#821
